AEV.caption: Multi Column Name
AEV.doc: This won't be shown in the pdf. This is only an internal reference so you type this same name when you want to insert elements inside this multi column. Tables, images and text are insertable. Note that inserted elements must be between the Start and End actions.
AEV.name: multiColumnName

AGt.caption: Being repeated
AGt.doc: If this column is being repeated inside a repeating structure, use "yes".
AGt.name: being_repeated

AGu.caption: Repeating structure name
AGu.doc: The name of the repeating structure this multi column is going to be repeated into.
AGu.name: repeating_structure_name
